songs.title: Lover’s Lullaby
songs.lyrics:
Shoelaces undone on the floor
Aching heart won't hurt anymore
In my arms I'll hold you some more
And sing you a lullaby

Breathing in and breathing slow
Candles flickre in your glow
Maybe just tonight, I know
So I'll sing you a lullaby

And as you drift off to sleep
You will remain safe in my keep
Like the ocean down in the deep
You will sleep

In the morning you will arise
And open those beautiful eyes
But before we say our goodbyes
Remember our lullaby
A lover's lullaby
